11 pointCloudPtr create_sq_cloud(const double e1, const double e2, const double x,
12  const double y, const double z){
13  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
14  sq_fitting::sq super;
15  super.a1 = 0.1;
16  super.a2 = 0.1;
17  super.a3 = 0.1;
18  //super.a4 = 2.0;
19  super.e1 = e1;
20  super.e2 = e2;
21  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
22  pose.position.x = x;
23  pose.position.y = y;
24  pose.position.z = z;
25  pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
26  super.pose = pose;
27  std::unique_ptr<Sampling> samp(new Sampling(super));
28  samp->sample_pilu_fisher();
29  samp->getCloud(cloud);
30  return cloud;
31 }

34 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
35 {
36  pointCloudPtr cloud_combined(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>());
37  pointCloudPtr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>());
38  for (double i=0.0;i<=2.5;i+=0.5){
39  for (double j=0.0;j<=2.5;j+=0.5){
40  if(i==0.0)
41  i+=0.1;
42  if(j==0.0)
43  j+=0.1;
44 
45  cloud = create_sq_cloud(i,j, j, (2.5-i), 0.0); // for a1, a2, a3 = 0.1, a4 = 2.0
46  //cloud = create_st_cloud(i,j, j/10.0, (2.5-i)/10.0, 0.0); // for a1, a2, a3 = 0.01, a4 = 0.2
47  std::cout<<"Creating cloud# "<<"e1: "<<i<<" e2: "<<j<<" x: "<<j*2.0<<" y: "<<(2.5-i)*2.0<<std::endl;// for a1, a2, a3 = 0.1, a4 = 2.0
48  //std::cout<<"Creating cloud# "<<"e1: "<<i<<" e2: "<<j<<" x: "<< j/10.0<<" y: "<<(2.5-i)/10.0<<std::endl; // for a1, a2, a3 = 0.01, a4 = 0.2
49  if(i==0.1)
50  i-=0.1;
51  if(j==0.1)
52  j-=0.1;
53  *cloud_combined+=*cloud;
54  }
55  }
56 
57  pcl::io::savePCDFileASCII ("big_superquadrics.pcd", *cloud_combined);
58  std::cerr << "Saved " << cloud_combined->points.size () << " data points to big_superquadrics.pcd." << std::endl;
